content: Kudos @Alan Mels !
Absolutely!
@Alan Mels ++
mels** Cheers (Karma: 3)

https://www.altagrade.com/blog/altagrade-donates-domain-name-backdroporg-backdrop-community

AltaGrade donates the domain name "backdrop.org" to the Backdrop community • AltaGrade
Today, on behalf of my company, AltaGrade I'm happy and proud to announce that the domain name backdrop.org is safely returning to its rightful owner, the Backdrop community, as an unconditional donation!
Thanks so much @Alan Mels and team!

Is this the first the PMC is hearing of this donation, or have discussions been happening behind-the-scenes? Either way, any indication of what we're planning to do with it (make it the canonical source, redirect it to backdropcms.org, something else...)?

I reached out PMC about the domain name some time ago. It was decided to announce during Bakcdrop LIVE event. Now it's up to community what to do with it, but I think the sooner backdropcms.org is replaced with backdrop.org the better.

Shall we re-purpose https://github.com/backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org/issues/594 in order to discuss how to use the new domain then?

Alternatives for changing the domain name `backdropcms.org`? · Issue #594 · backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org
I'd like to apologize beforehand for such a blasphemy of novice user of doubting the domain name to which probably the Backdrop community has got used since long. Not to be taken wrongly - I li...
If so, maybe @Alan Mels can post there with a link to the blog post stating that the domain name has been secured and donated.
Thanks again @Alan Mels ++ ...I've added your blog post announcement to https://backdropcms.org/news/mentions
mels** :-) (Karma: 4)

...now also added to https://backdropcms.org/thank-you:
image.png

klonos said:

...now also added to https://backdropcms.org/thank-you:
image.png

Thank you, @klonos. You might hide the AltaGrade logo that is also seen on the bottom of the page https://backdropcms.org/thank-you
I did that already. I just need to clear caches :sweat_smile:
I just published a new blog post: https://backdropcms.org/news/altagrade-donates-backdrop-dot-org-to-community
We should buy one of those dragon Esty boxes and send it to Alan as a thank you :grinning_face_with_smiling_eyes:
Is someone talking about me?

@quicksketch Thank you very much for the post! Everything looks really good. Just one request, please change "Altagrade" in title to "AltaGrade", that's how our branding specialist recommended to always use it.

And using this opportunity, everybody please accept my apologies for being excessively expressive on https://github.com/backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org/issues/594 Often time I can sound harsh, but stay assured no any bad intentions. And let's work on code and leave this subject for a while until PMC does it's inner workings. Peace!

Alternatives for changing the domain name `backdropcms.org`? · Issue #594 · backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org
I'd like to apologize beforehand for such a blasphemy of novice user of doubting the domain name to which probably the Backdrop community has got used since long. Not to be taken wrongly - I li...
We still love you @Alan Mels :wink::big_smile:
Thanks @Alan Mels! Looks like someone beat me to fixing the blog post. The title is correct already.
